/**
 * Task-related utility functions
 */import{PRIORITIES}from'../constants/priorities';/**
 * Get the badge CSS classes for a priority level
 */export function getPriorityBadge(priority){switch(priority){case'high':return'bg-rose-100 text-rose-700 border-rose-200';case'medium':return'bg-amber-100 text-amber-700 border-amber-200';case'low':return'bg-blue-100 text-blue-700 border-blue-200';default:return'bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 border-gray-200';}}/**
 * Get the emoji icon for a priority level
 */export function getTaskIcon(priority){switch(priority){case'high':return'ðŸ”¥';case'medium':return'âš¡';case'low':return'ðŸ’¡';default:return'ðŸ“';}}/**
 * Get task status with backward compatibility
 * Returns status if defined, otherwise derives from completed boolean
 */export function getTaskStatus(task){if(task.status){return task.status;}// Backward compatibility: derive status from completed boolean
return task.completed?'completed':'pending';}/**
 * Count words in a text string
 */export function countWords(text){return text.trim().split(/\s+/).filter(w=>w.length>0).length;}/**
 * Estimate reading time for a text
 * @returns Reading time string (e.g., "2 min read") or null if text is empty
 */export function estimateReadingTime(text){const words=countWords(text);if(words===0)return null;const minutes=Math.ceil(words/200);return"".concat(minutes," min read");}/**
 * Get priority configuration
 */export function getPriorityConfig(priority){return PRIORITIES[priority];}
